attraction_reviewComments: We drove Sunset in our car rental and it was beautiful, but it was much better in the guided tour as all the celebrity hotspots were revealed. If you have time, then you should... read more
Bring patience for driving the strip, but take a walk around. Historic rock clubs everywhere! If clubbing is your thing, you can find that too. Be prepared for some velvet-rope... read more
Okay, so Sunset Boulevard needs to be seen...one time. Once you've been there, you've seen it, and that's it. It is quirky, funny, and interesting, but it's also crowded and... read more
We only drove down the famous 'Strip' as part of a coach tour, and didn't stop, which was a shame as it would have been nice to stroll around and take in the sights. There are... read more
A few nifty boutiques and food places littered along this street. I would drive until I see something I like before stopping by. Quite a distance to walk
In the 80", I was not allowed to go the Sunset Strip, my parents stated; "that's where the druggies hang out". And now, I love going w/friends, out of town guests and solo. It's... read more

Some parts were dirty but not too dirty. I drove down on my way from my hotel in Koreatown to the PCH. Very busy as it is a main thoroughfare. Many businesses on the road.
We really enjoyed walking here and stopping to eat and drink in plenty of different places. Will be back.
Great street to go for an explore along. Plenty of places to stop and have a bite to eat. Worth a wander :)

We walked the length of this road and it was a great thing to do, stopped off at random places and see how the rich and famous live their lives.
Walked a long way on the Sunset Boulevard to see the Sunset Strip. The street in itself had a lot of places to see along the way. It was nice.

This was a really fun and vibrant place to visit. There was a substantial amount if entertainment and several good restaurants to eat at while you are there.

You can see some great music here, find different restaurants, or get ripped off. At night you can see some really different types of fauna.
